data.title: Columbus Blue Jackets
data.meta_description: The official National Hockey League website including news, rosters, stats, schedules, teams, and video.
data.text:
You can follow the Blue Jackets on the Blue Jackets Radio Network featuring stations across Ohio and West Virginia with Bob McElligott calling the play-by-play. Before the game, Dylan Tyrer previews the night's matchup on the Toyota Pre-Game show. Following the game, the Pedialyte Post-Game Show provides an in-depth recap including highlights, interviews and more.

Tune in for The Inside Edge presented by First Merchants Bank with Jody Shelley and Bob McElligott on Wednesdays from 7-8 p.m. during the regular season on 97.1 The Fan and BlueJackets.com. Each week, Jody and Bob give you an insider's perspective on the Blue Jackets, delivering their insight on the team and the NHL, plus player interviews and special guests.
